hotels.name: Taj Lake Palace
hotels.summary: A stunning heritage hotel floating on Lake Pichola, offering breathtaking views and royal experiences.
hotels.description: Experience the grandeur of Rajasthani royalty at Taj Lake Palace. This iconic white marble palace seems to float on the serene waters of Lake Pichola. Built in 1746, it served as a royal summer palace and now offers an unparalleled luxury experience with world-class dining, spa treatments, and personalized butler service.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of Udaipur, surrounded by Lake Pichola.

hotels.name: Lakeview Retreat Udaipur
hotels.summary: Boutique hotel with panoramic lake views and rooftop dining.
hotels.description: Enjoy a peaceful stay with modern amenities, rooftop restaurant, and easy access to Udaipur's top attractions.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Fateh Sagar Lake, close to city center.

hotels.name: City Palace Inn
hotels.summary: Affordable hotel steps from City Palace.
hotels.description: Stay in the heart of Udaipur, walk to City Palace and Jagdish Temple. Clean rooms, friendly staff, and local cuisine.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near City Palace, bustling old city area.

hotels.name: Aravali Hills Resort
hotels.summary: Resort with pool and mountain views on the outskirts of Udaipur.
hotels.description: Relax in a peaceful setting with a pool, gardens, and views of the Aravali hills. Great for families and groups.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located on the outskirts, 20 minutes from city center.

hotels.name: Backpacker's Paradise Goa
hotels.summary: Budget-friendly hostel just 5 minutes walk from Baga Beach.
hotels.description: Chill vibes, friendly staff, and the best beach access in North Goa. Perfect for solo travelers and backpackers looking to explore Goa's famous beaches, nightlife, and water sports. Join our daily beach volleyball games and Saturday night parties!
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of Baga, close to nightlife.

hotels.name: Seaside Resort Calangute
hotels.summary: Modern resort with pool, spa, and direct beach access.
hotels.description: Relax in style at this beachfront resort with a large pool, spa, and multi-cuisine restaurant. Perfect for families and couples.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On Calangute Beach, close to nightlife and water sports.

hotels.name: Palm Grove Guest House
hotels.summary: Budget guest house with garden and cafe.
hotels.description: Affordable stay with a tropical garden, on-site cafe, and friendly staff. Walk to the beach in 5 minutes.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Quiet lane near Calangute Market.

hotels.name: Goa Beach Hostel
hotels.summary: Lively hostel for backpackers, 2 minutes from the beach.
hotels.description: Meet travelers from around the world, join nightly parties, and enjoy the best of Goa's nightlife.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Just off Calangute Beach, close to clubs and shacks.

hotels.name: Mountain View Villa Manali
hotels.summary: Cozy wooden cottage with stunning Himalayan views.
hotels.description: Escape to this beautiful villa surrounded by apple orchards and pine forests. Wake up to breathtaking views of snow-capped peaks, enjoy bonfires under starlit skies, and explore the charming cafes of Old Manali. Perfect for couples and families seeking mountain tranquility.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Peaceful location in Old Manali, 10 minutes from Mall Road.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: March to June, October to February (snow)

hotels.name: Snow Peak Resort Manali
hotels.summary: Luxury resort with mountain views and spa facilities.
hotels.description: Enjoy a relaxing stay with panoramic views of the Himalayas, a full-service spa, and gourmet dining.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Solang Valley, 15 minutes from Mall Road.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: March to June, October to February (snow)

hotels.name: Apple Orchard Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay surrounded by apple orchards, perfect for families.
hotels.description: Experience local hospitality, home-cooked meals, and beautiful gardens. Great for kids and nature lovers.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Naggar Road, peaceful countryside.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: March to June, October to February (snow)

hotels.name: Riverside Camps Manali
hotels.summary: Adventure camp by the river with bonfire and trekking.
hotels.description: Stay in comfortable tents, enjoy riverside bonfires, and join daily trekking expeditions. Perfect for adventure seekers.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On the banks of Beas River, 10 km from Manali town.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: March to June, October to February (snow)

hotels.name: Heritage Haveli Jaipur
hotels.summary: Stay in a 200-year-old restored haveli with traditional Rajasthani architecture.
hotels.description: Experience authentic Rajasthani hospitality with hand-painted frescoes and rooftop views. This beautifully restored haveli transports you to the era of Rajput kings with its intricate jharokhas, courtyards, and antique furnishings while offering modern comforts.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in the Pink City's old quarter, walking distance to Hawa Mahal.

hotels.name: Royal Heritage Hotel Jaipur
hotels.summary: Modern hotel with rooftop pool and city views.
hotels.description: Enjoy luxury and comfort in the heart of Jaipur, with a rooftop pool, spa, and fine dining restaurant.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near MI Road, close to City Palace and Hawa Mahal.

hotels.name: Pink City Guest House
hotels.summary: Budget guest house with traditional decor.
hotels.description: Stay in the heart of the Pink City, enjoy home-cooked meals and a friendly atmosphere.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Bapu Bazaar, walking distance to major attractions.

hotels.name: Amber Fort View Hotel
hotels.summary: Hotel with views of Amber Fort and rooftop restaurant.
hotels.description: Enjoy stunning views of Amber Fort, relax at the rooftop restaurant, and explore Jaipur's royal history.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Amber Fort, 20 minutes from city center.

hotels.name: Beachfront Cottage Kerala
hotels.summary: Private cottage on Varkala cliff with direct beach access.
hotels.description: Wake up to the sound of waves with stunning sunset views over the Arabian Sea. This cliff-top cottage offers a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure. Spend your days doing yoga, swimming in the sea, and evenings watching spectacular sunsets.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located on Varkala Cliff, surrounded by yoga centers and cafes.

hotels.name: Cliffside Retreat Varkala
hotels.summary: Boutique hotel on Varkala cliff with sea views and yoga deck.
hotels.description: Relax in stylish rooms with balconies overlooking the Arabian Sea. Daily yoga sessions and a rooftop cafe.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On Varkala Cliff, steps from cafes and the beach.

hotels.name: Palm Grove Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay with garden, close to the beach.
hotels.description: Family-run homestay with lush gardens, home-cooked meals, and a peaceful vibe. 10-minute walk to the beach.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Quiet lane near Janardana Swamy Temple.

hotels.name: Sunset Beach Resort
hotels.summary: Resort with pool and sunset views, steps from the beach.
hotels.description: Spacious rooms, infinity pool, and a beachside restaurant. Perfect for couples and families.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On the beach, close to Kappil Lake.

hotels.name: Luxury Suite Mumbai
hotels.summary: Modern high-rise apartment in Bandra with city skyline views.
hotels.description: Stylish 2BHK apartment with premium amenities and gym access. Located in Mumbai's most happening neighborhood, you're walking distance from celebrity cafes, designer boutiques, and the iconic Bandstand promenade.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in Bandra West, Mumbai's trendiest neighborhood.

hotels.name: Seaview Towers Mumbai
hotels.summary: Luxury high-rise with sea views and infinity pool.
hotels.description: Modern apartments with panoramic views of the Arabian Sea, rooftop infinity pool, and gym. Located in Worli.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Worli Sea Face, close to business district and Bandra-Worli Sea Link.

hotels.name: Colaba Heritage Hotel
hotels.summary: Charming heritage hotel in Colaba, near Gateway of India.
hotels.description: Stay in a restored colonial building with vintage decor, close to Mumbai's top attractions and shopping.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Colaba Causeway, walking distance to Gateway of India.

hotels.name: Bandra Studio Suites
hotels.summary: Trendy studio apartments in Bandra, perfect for business travelers.
hotels.description: Modern studios with kitchenette, high-speed WiFi, and easy access to Bandra's cafes and nightlife.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Bandra West, close to cafes and shopping.

hotels.name: Treehouse Retreat Munnar
hotels.summary: Unique treehouse experience amidst tea plantations.
hotels.description: Stay in an eco-friendly treehouse surrounded by lush greenery. Perched among the branches, wake up to misty mornings, bird songs, and endless views of rolling tea gardens. A truly magical experience for nature lovers.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in the scenic hills of Munnar, surrounded by tea estates.

hotels.name: Tea Valley Resort Munnar
hotels.summary: Resort nestled in tea gardens with panoramic views.
hotels.description: Stay in cozy cottages surrounded by tea plantations, enjoy nature walks, and relax at the in-house spa.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On Bison Valley Road, close to main attractions.

hotels.name: Hilltop Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay with mountain views and home-cooked meals.
hotels.description: Experience local hospitality, enjoy home-cooked Kerala meals, and relax on the terrace with mountain views.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Mattupetty Dam, peaceful hillside location.

hotels.name: Mist Valley Camps
hotels.summary: Adventure camp with bonfire and guided treks.
hotels.description: Stay in comfortable tents, enjoy bonfire nights, and join daily guided treks through the hills.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On the outskirts, surrounded by misty hills.

hotels.name: Houseboat Experience Alleppey
hotels.summary: Traditional Kerala houseboat cruise through the backwaters.
hotels.description: Experience the famous Kerala backwaters on a traditional kettuvallam. Glide through serene canals lined with palm trees, watch village life unfold on the banks, and feast on freshly prepared Kerala cuisine by your onboard chef.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Cruise through serene backwaters, passing through villages and paddy fields.

hotels.name: Backwater Bliss Resort
hotels.summary: Luxury resort on the backwaters with pool and spa.
hotels.description: Enjoy a relaxing stay with private balconies, infinity pool, and authentic Kerala cuisine. Daily boat rides available.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On the banks of Punnamada Lake, close to houseboat boarding points.

hotels.name: Canal Side Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay with canal views and home-cooked meals.
hotels.description: Family-run homestay with traditional Kerala hospitality, delicious meals, and peaceful surroundings.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Krishnapuram Palace, quiet canal-side lane.

hotels.name: Houseboat Stay Deluxe
hotels.summary: Deluxe houseboat with all meals and sunset cruise.
hotels.description: Spacious houseboat with AC rooms, onboard chef, and daily sunset cruises through the backwaters.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Cruising the backwaters, boarding at Finishing Point.

hotels.name: Cozy Studio Bangalore
hotels.summary: Modern studio apartment in Indiranagar. Perfect for business travelers.
hotels.description: Well-designed studio with work desk and high-speed WiFi. Located in Bangalore's most vibrant neighborhood, you're surrounded by craft breweries, trendy cafes, boutique stores, and the famous 100 Feet Road nightlife.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in Indiranagar, Bangalore's hippest neighborhood.

hotels.name: Garden City Suites
hotels.summary: Modern hotel in Indiranagar with rooftop bar and gym.
hotels.description: Enjoy stylish rooms, a rooftop bar, and easy access to Bangalore's best nightlife and shopping.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Indiranagar, close to 100 Feet Road and metro station.

hotels.name: Cubbon Park Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay near Cubbon Park with garden and home-cooked meals.
hotels.description: Family-run homestay with a peaceful garden, delicious South Indian breakfasts, and a central location.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Cubbon Park, close to MG Road.

hotels.name: Tech Hub Hostel
hotels.summary: Hostel for techies and backpackers, close to IT parks.
hotels.description: Affordable dorms, high-speed WiFi, and a co-working space. Great for digital nomads and solo travelers.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Whitefield, near major tech parks.

hotels.name: Desert Camp Jaisalmer
hotels.summary: Luxury desert camping with camel safari and cultural performances.
hotels.description: Experience the magic of the Thar Desert in style. Watch the sunset paint the dunes golden, enjoy authentic Rajasthani folk music under the stars, and fall asleep in your luxury tent after a delicious dinner.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in the Sam Sand Dunes, 45 km from Jaisalmer city.

hotels.name: Golden Fort View Hotel
hotels.summary: Hotel with rooftop restaurant and fort views.
hotels.description: Enjoy panoramic views of Jaisalmer Fort, rooftop dining, and traditional Rajasthani hospitality.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Jaisalmer Fort, walking distance to main attractions.

hotels.name: Desert Pearl Camp
hotels.summary: Luxury desert camp with cultural shows and camel rides.
hotels.description: Stay in luxury tents, enjoy folk music, and experience the magic of the Thar Desert.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Sam Sand Dunes, 40 km from Jaisalmer city.

hotels.name: Haveli Heritage Stay
hotels.summary: Stay in a restored haveli with antique decor and courtyard.
hotels.description: Experience royal living in a traditional haveli, enjoy home-cooked meals and guided tours.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Gadisar Lake, close to city center.

hotels.name: Colonial Bungalow Ooty
hotels.summary: Charming British-era bungalow with manicured gardens and valley views.
hotels.description: Step back in time in this lovingly restored colonial bungalow. Enjoy log fires in the evening, stroll through English gardens, and wake up to misty mountain views. Perfect for families wanting an old-world charm experience.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located on a quiet hillside in Ooty, close to Botanical Gardens.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: March to June, September to November

hotels.name: Hill View Resort Ooty
hotels.summary: Resort with panoramic valley views and gardens.
hotels.description: Spacious rooms, landscaped gardens, and a multi-cuisine restaurant. Perfect for families and couples.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On Fern Hill, close to Ooty Lake and Botanical Gardens.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: March to June, September to November

hotels.name: Rose Garden Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay near Rose Garden with home-cooked meals.
hotels.description: Charming homestay with a rose garden, delicious breakfasts, and a peaceful setting.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Rose Garden, close to city center.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: March to June, September to November

hotels.name: Nilgiri Mountain Hostel
hotels.summary: Hostel for backpackers with mountain views and bonfire nights.
hotels.description: Affordable dorms, mountain views, and nightly bonfires. Great for solo travelers and groups.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On the outskirts, surrounded by Nilgiri hills.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: March to June, September to November

hotels.name: Riverside Cottage Rishikesh
hotels.summary: Peaceful retreat by the Ganges with yoga and meditation facilities.
hotels.description: Find inner peace at this serene cottage overlooking the sacred Ganges. Join morning yoga sessions, meditate to the sound of the flowing river, and explore the spiritual energy of this holy city.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in Tapovan, surrounded by ashrams and adventure activities.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: September to November, February to May

hotels.name: Ganga View Retreat
hotels.summary: Hotel with river views, yoga deck, and vegetarian restaurant.
hotels.description: Enjoy peaceful rooms overlooking the Ganges, daily yoga sessions, and pure vegetarian cuisine.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Laxman Jhula, close to ashrams and cafes.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: September to November, February to May

hotels.name: Ashram Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay with meditation hall and home-cooked meals.
hotels.description: Stay with a spiritual family, join meditation sessions, and enjoy sattvic meals in a peaceful setting.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Ram Jhula, close to ashrams and temples.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: September to November, February to May

hotels.name: Adventure Camp Rishikesh
hotels.summary: Riverside camp with rafting, bonfire, and yoga.
hotels.description: Stay in comfortable tents by the river, enjoy adventure sports, and join evening bonfires and yoga sessions.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On the banks of the Ganges, 8 km from city center.
hotels.best_time_to_visit: September to November, February to May

hotels.name: Farm Stay Punjab
hotels.summary: Authentic Punjabi village experience with farm activities.
hotels.description: Live the village life! Wake up to roosters, milk cows, ride tractors, and feast on the most delicious sarson da saag and makki di roti. Experience the legendary Punjabi hospitality that will warm your heart forever.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in rural Punjab, offering genuine countryside experience.

hotels.name: Golden Temple View Hotel
hotels.summary: Hotel with views of Golden Temple and rooftop restaurant.
hotels.description: Enjoy comfortable rooms, a rooftop restaurant, and walking distance to the Golden Temple.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Golden Temple, close to Jallianwala Bagh.

hotels.name: Punjabi Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay with garden, home-cooked meals, and Punjabi hospitality.
hotels.description: Stay with a local family, enjoy authentic Punjabi food, and experience village life.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Hall Bazaar, close to city center.

hotels.name: Wagah Border Guest House
hotels.summary: Guest house near Wagah Border with cultural shows.
hotels.description: Comfortable rooms, daily cultural shows, and easy access to the Wagah Border ceremony.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Near Wagah Border, 30 minutes from city center.

hotels.name: Penthouse Suite Delhi
hotels.summary: Luxurious penthouse in South Delhi with panoramic city views.
hotels.description: Experience Delhi's finest living in this stunning penthouse. With floor-to-ceiling windows, a private terrace, jacuzzi, and home theater, this is urban luxury at its best. Perfect for celebrating special occasions.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located in Greater Kailash, South Delhi's upscale neighborhood.

hotels.name: Connaught Place Suites
hotels.summary: Luxury suites in the heart of Delhi with city views.
hotels.description: Spacious suites, rooftop pool, and fine dining. Steps from Connaught Place and metro station.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Connaught Place, close to shopping and business district.

hotels.name: South Delhi Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay with garden, home-cooked meals, and family atmosphere.
hotels.description: Stay with a local family, enjoy delicious North Indian food, and relax in a peaceful garden.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Greater Kailash, close to markets and metro.

hotels.name: Heritage Guest House Delhi
hotels.summary: Guest house in Old Delhi with heritage decor and rooftop cafe.
hotels.description: Stay in a restored haveli, enjoy heritage interiors, and dine at the rooftop cafe overlooking Old Delhi.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Chandni Chowk, close to Red Fort and Jama Masjid.

hotels.name: Beach Shack Gokarna
hotels.summary: Simple bamboo shack steps away from Om Beach.
hotels.description: Disconnect from the world in this charming beach shack. Fall asleep to crashing waves, wake up for sunrise yoga on the beach, spend days swimming and reading. The perfect digital detox destination.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Located on the serene Om Beach, away from crowds.

hotels.name: Om Beach Resort
hotels.summary: Resort with sea views, pool, and yoga classes.
hotels.description: Spacious cottages, infinity pool, and daily yoga sessions. Steps from Om Beach.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On Om Beach, close to cafes and water sports.

hotels.name: Kudle Cliff Homestay
hotels.summary: Homestay on Kudle Beach cliff with garden and home-cooked meals.
hotels.description: Family-run homestay with sea views, delicious food, and a peaceful garden. 5-minute walk to Kudle Beach.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: Kudle Beach cliff, close to cafes and yoga centers.

hotels.name: Paradise Beach Hostel
hotels.summary: Hostel for backpackers, steps from Paradise Beach.
hotels.description: Affordable dorms, beach bonfires, and a lively atmosphere. Great for solo travelers and groups.
hotels.neighborhood_overview: On Paradise Beach, away from crowds.
